Plant marker: Write the name of each plant on a paperclip and use it as a marker in your garden or indoor plants, making it easy to identify each plant type.
Cable organizer: Use paperclips to bundle and organize cables and wires, preventing them from tangling and making it easier to find and access the cables you need.
Bookmark: Attach a paperclip to the top of a bookmark to prevent it from getting lost or damaged, and use it to hold the pages of a book together.
Gift tag: Write a personal message on a paperclip and attach it to a gift as a unique and creative tag.
Keychain: Attach a paperclip to a keychain to hold keys together and add a touch of personality to your keys.
